ai-patthana10.6:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means pervading the three watches of the night.
ai-patthana10.6:0.3_0: robes and so on, looking for the shadow,
ai-patthana10.6:3.1_3: He doesn’t give rise to the hindrance of unskillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana10.6:3.1_4: It’s not skilled in the next life.
ai-patthana10.6:3.1_5: This is the section in brief.
